name: Run the World
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 38, back in 2017 - a traditional scaline racer using only C++ and SDL! I wanted to write more cities, based on cities I had visited by then. Unfortunately, time constraints prevented me from doing so.

Click to accelerate and steer!

(bear in mind I wrote this from scratch in 3 days!)

I also have a DOS port, but I'm not sure I should release it - the speed is far from what I want.
